channel.title: How do i make everything sellable to general store?
channel.description: I honestly dont know how to do this. Do i open shop.cfg and manually put every item in the game in the store?? lol Thanks for any help

item.title: How do i make everything sellable to general store?
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

yeah, I know that, my server doesn’t use the .cfg, it’s uses a Shophandler.java and shop.java, easier to manage, but looks more complex.

item.title: How do i make everything sellable to general store?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

gamerbug:

if this was a 508, i could help… but 317 are shit. I hate them… so I can’t help. lmao

Your post helps in no way to make 503+ look any better then 317. The matter of the fact is 317’s make 503+ look like shit.

It may also depend on the server you use, some servers use a different form for shops. Look in your shopHandler, to find out how the shop set up is.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make everything sellable to general store?

item.title: How do i make everything sellable to general store?
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

shop = 12 General_Store 1 1 2428 100 113 100 2432 100 2446 500 590 100 5605 100 1351 100 1265 100 2347 100 952 500 227 50000 314 50000 303 5 301 5 311 5 1436 100000 532 10000 1777 2000 1540 100
The first number, change to 0 or 2 i think.
Can’t quite remember,
Its one of the two numbers
